name: Micka's Swingy Hazing
description:
Hey boys and girls!

Here is my first solo made game, Micka's Swingy Hazing. In this game, you play Micka, a little gentleman looking man, who's trying to avoid those big vinyles that are charging him. The only thing you can do is press space to make it jump!

This is a one button game I have to make for a school project, and as I'm only a Game Designer and not a programmer, you might encounter some glitches :s

Still, I hope you'll enjoy playing it as I enjoyed create it!
